openGraph.title: Britecharts, a D3.js based charting library of reusable components
openGraph.description: Britecharts is a client-side reusable Charting Library based on D3.js v4 that allows easy and intuitive use of charts and components that can be composed together creating amazing visualizations.

meta.title: Britecharts - D3.js based charting library of reusable components
meta.description: Britecharts is a client-side reusable Charting Library based on D3.js v4 that allows easy and intuitive use of charts and components that can be composed together creating amazing visualizations.
